name: Disoriented
description: The character can only react or try to recover from this condition while it is active.
recover: Spend 5 ticks as immediate action to get orientation again. No check required.

name: Shock
description: The character can only react try to recover from this condition while it is active.
recover: Spend 5 ticks as immediate action to perform a toughness check difficulty 15. Recover if successful.

name: Unconscious
description: The character can only try to recover from this condition while it is active. No reactions possible.
recover: Spend 15 ticks as immediate action to perform a toughness check difficulty 20. Recover if successful.

name: Coma
description: The character is completely incapacitated and can't act or react.
recover: Medicine check with difficulty 25 is required to bring someone back from a coma. After each completed week the character might also try a toughness check with difficulty 25 to naturally recover.

name: Bleeding
description: Each level of this condition causes 1d6 damage every 10 ticks. This damage ignores any armor.
recover: Can be stopped with a medical check difficulty 15 + level of the condition or when the character rests for 30 ticks.

name: Burning
description: Each level of this condition causes 1d6 damage every 10 ticks. This damage ignores any armor.
recover: Character can perform an acrobatics check 15 + level of the condition to roll on the ground or be extinguished (for example by jumping into water).

name: Confused
description: Each level of this condition apply a penalty of one on attack checks.
recover: Spend 10 Ticks to make a self-control check with difficulty 20 + level of the condition. Recover if successful.

name: Dazed
description: All actions and reactions of the character need an additional tick per level of this condition.
recover: Spend 10 Ticks to make a toughness check with difficulty 20 + level of the condition. Recover if successful.

name: Injured
description: Suffer one damage per level of this condition for each action or reaction performed.
recover: Can be stopped with a medical check difficulty 20 + level of the condition.

name: Exhausted
description: Suffer one mental damage per leve of this condition for each action or reaction performed.
recover: Resolve one level of this condition by resting for 20 ticks.
